Deliverable 02

Nov 9, 2021

Prior to the start of the project, We created a GitHub account. In Delivery 01, a repository called Img3Sum was created. It is Open-source projects that support translating, summarizing and converting images to text.

We add APACHE LICENSE and VERSION 2.0 in repo. The readme file was organized very well. We created two versions of the readme file which is korean and english. The contents of readme file is Core Concept, Features, How to Run?. We gave each team member the contributor authority in Img3sum Repo. The version was set to 0.0.1. Each team member posted a code with a commit message wenever there was a correction to the task given to them.

Open-source project that supports translating, summarizing and converting images to text.
